text: Bedtime for Bonzo is a comedy movie starring Ronald Reagan. It is about a chimpanzee named Bonzo. It was followed by Bonzo Goes to College in 1952 and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1950s family movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Movies about apes Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Fred de Cordova
title: Bedtime for Bonzo
